column1: 1. Which medieval country offered the most liberty in the world?
2. What did the English king have to sign in 1215 that limited his power?
3. Who was the last person to conquer England?
4. In 1289, England started the oldest representative group of people. What was this called?
5. What documents in America show that Americans were strongly influenced by the English?
column2: The Declaration of Independence and the Constitution
